text: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo seyyathidaṃ sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi
edit: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo seyyathidaṃ – sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi

translations.transtext: [It is] this noble eight-fold path, i.e. right view, right intention, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, [and] right concentration.
